Review of campaign rallies and TV ads: The expert analyzed the claims made by President Trump and Joe Biden during their campaign rallies and TV ads in key swing states.
Fact: checking of statements: The expert fact-checked the statements made by both candidates to verify their accuracy and authenticity.
Examination of job data: The expert examined job data related to the auto industry in Michigan to determine the impact of Trump's policies on the industry.
Comparison of claims with actual events: The expert compared the claims made by President Trump regarding the revitalization of the car industry in Michigan with the actual events and data available to assess their authenticity.
